data.meta_site_name: Chapel of Hope Funerals and Cremations
data.text:
Freddie Lew Chandler, Jr., 44, passed away October 28, 2017. Funeral services will be held Friday, November 3, 2017 at 2 pm at Chapel of Hope Funeral Home, 3321 N. Dal Paso, Hobbs, NM with Pastor John Ayers officiating. Burial will follow at Prairie Haven Memorial Park Cemetery, Hobbs.

Freddie was born on November 1, 1972 in Hobbs, NM. He married in 1993 at the age of 20 and had one son. Freddie soon moved to Nashville, TN in 1997 where he spend the rest of his life surrounded by family and the ones he loved. Freddie will best be remembered for his out-of-this world charisma, charm, warmness, and ability to live life to the fullest.

Freddie is survived by his son, Damon Chandler of Denver, CO; mother, Anita Chandler of Nashville, TN; sister, Elizabeth Chandler of Nashville, TN; brother, John Chandler of Nashville, TN; nephew, Dominic Chandler; niece, Chantel Chandler all of Nashville, TN; and numerous cousins and relatives and his special fur baby Ray-Ray.

He was preceded in death by his dad, Freddie Chandler, Sr; his paternal grandmother, Juanita (MooMoo) Chandler; and his maternal grandmother, Robinetta Freeman.
